title: Jenkins triggers Opera browser, but not Chrome
body:
I used the Execute Windows Batch Command as a Jenkins build step in order to trigger an app from my computer. When using "C:\Program Files (x86)\Opera\launcher.exe", when the job is built, opera browser opens up automatically. Though when I try to do the same thing for chrome, using this:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe"

the build never finishes. It is neither successful nor a failure.

Not sure why this happens. Any input on this? Thanks in advance!

(In general, anything run on the command prompt, should also be executed in Jenkins from the batch command window)
